Name: Property
Description: The concept type for property descriptors in schemas.

Properties.Name: Type
Properties.Description: The expected type of the object referred to by this property

Properties.Name: Schema
Properties.Description: The link from a property to its underlying type. This forces a property to only belong to a single type.

Properties.Name: Unique
Properties.Description: If this is true, the property can point to only one object. By default, properties can point to multiple objects.

Properties.Name: Required
Properties.Description: If this is true, the property has to be set in order for the type to be valid. It's used in CVT ONLY
